categories: Category:Star Wars: X-Wing Miniatures Game Epic Play

nodes.text: The Imperial Assault Carrier Expansion Pack is a supplement to the Star Wars: X-Wing Miniatures Game from Fantasy Flight Games. The expansion features detailed miniatures of the Gozanti-class cruiser and two TIE fighter escorts. It was released on December 23, 2015 as part of the game's Epic Play format.

Pursue the Rebellion's subversive agents across the galaxy with the Imperial Assault Carrier Expansion Pack for X-Wing™! Designed for use within the game's Cinematic Play and Epic Play formats, the Imperial Assault Carrier Expansion Pack's pre-painted Gozanti-class cruiser miniature comes accompanied by two TIE fighter escorts, eleven ship cards, and twenty-six upgrades. Additionally, the expansion includes a set of four new missions for Cinematic Play that follow a Gozanti charged with intercepting and destroying agents of the Rebel Alliance.
The Imperial Assault Carrier Expansion Pack contains three miniatures, plus two maneuver dials and action tokens, as well as pilot and upgrade cards.
